abstract: First-half performance figures are showing the same pattern for hedge funds as for more mainstream investors — the most successful were in fixed income, the least successful in stocks.
snippet: First-half performance figures are showing the same pattern for hedge funds as for more mainstream investors — the most successful were in fixed income, the least successful in stocks.
lead_paragraph: First-half performance figures are showing the same pattern for hedge funds as for more mainstream investors — the most successful were in fixed income, the least successful in stocks, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Hedge Funds Thrive on Fixed Income in First Half
